text.section: There is a State Coal Combustion By-Products Management Fund.

The Fund shall consist of:
Fees collected by the Department under § 9-283 of this subtitle;
Funds appropriated by the General Assembly for deposit to the Fund; and
Any additional money made available from any sources, public or private, for the purposes for which the Fund has been established.

section.section: The Fund is a special, continuing, nonlapsing fund that is not subject to § 7-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
Notwithstanding any law to the contrary, unused money in the Fund may not revert to the General Fund.

text.section: The Fund shall be maintained and administered by the Department in accordance with the provisions of this part and any regulations the Department adopts.
